label: frontend-library
description: This category includes frontend libraries used in web development to create user interfaces and manage the application's frontend logic.

features.label: react
features.description: A JavaScript library for building interactive user interfaces, offering a component-based architecture and efficient rendering.

label: fetch-api
description: The Fetch API category includes options for handling HTTP requests and fetching resources from a server.

features.label: fetch
features.description: Enables using the native Fetch API to perform asynchronous HTTP requests in web applications.

features.label: axios
features.description: A popular JavaScript library used for handling HTTP requests with additional features and browser compatibility.

label: ui-library
description: UI Library category comprises various libraries providing pre-designed components and styles for building visually appealing user interfaces.

features.label: ant-design
features.description: A comprehensive UI library offering a set of high-quality React components with a modern design.

features.label: material-ui
features.description: A popular React UI framework implementing Google's Material Design principles.

features.label: bootstrap
features.description: A widely used CSS framework providing responsive and mobile-friendly UI components.

label: state-management
description: State Management category deals with libraries or approaches to manage the application's state and data flow.

features.label: redux
features.description: A predictable state container for JavaScript apps, commonly used with React for managing global application state.

features.label: zustand
features.description: A small and lightweight state management library for React applications.

features.label: context-api
features.description: A built-in state management approach in React using context objects for sharing state across components.

features.label: jotai
features.description: A new and efficient state management library for React applications, providing a simple and flexible approach.
